entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning then snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
